input.sentences: the eldest members of the family read off the names of all present .
one of the women cooked in a trash can on an open fire .
while grandpa entertained the youngest members of the family .
a good time was had by all who attended the family reunion .
output.sentences: the three ladies were not impressed reading this letter.
However the four boys were recording their reactions.
The mom was displeased and decided to burn it.
Grandpa and the two boys were bored but curious.
Later on the family decided to sit down and eat some food.
